docs.title: Scikit-learn User Guide
docs.description: Comprehensive documentation for scikit-learn, a popular Python library for machine learning.

docs.title: TensorFlow Documentation
docs.description: Official documentation for TensorFlow, an end-to-end open-source platform for machine learning.

docs.title: PyTorch Documentation
docs.description: Official documentation for PyTorch, an open-source machine learning framework that accelerates the path from research prototyping to production deployment.

docs.title: Keras Documentation
docs.description: Documentation for Keras, a high-level API for building and training neural networks, often used with TensorFlow.

blogs.title: Towards Data Science
blogs.description: A popular Medium publication featuring articles on data science, machine learning, AI, and more.
blogs.price: Free (with Medium membership for some articles)

blogs.title: Machine Learning Mastery
blogs.description: A blog by Jason Brownlee offering practical tutorials and guides on machine learning.

blogs.title: Distill.pub
blogs.description: A journal dedicated to clear, concise, and visual explanations of machine learning concepts.

blogs.title: Google AI Blog
blogs.description: Official blog from Google AI, sharing research and advancements in artificial intelligence.

youtube.title: StatQuest with Josh Starmer
youtube.description: Clear and intuitive explanations of complex machine learning and statistics concepts.

youtube.title: DeepLearning.AI
youtube.description: Content from Andrew Ng's DeepLearning.AI, including lectures and interviews on AI and ML.

youtube.title: sentdex
youtube.description: Practical Python programming tutorials, including many on machine learning and AI applications.

youtube.title: 3Blue1Brown
youtube.description: Visually stunning explanations of mathematical concepts, including those fundamental to machine learning.

free_courses.title: Machine Learning by Andrew Ng (Coursera)
free_courses.description: A foundational and highly popular course covering the basics of machine learning.

free_courses.title: Introduction to Machine Learning for Coders (fast.ai)
free_courses.description: A practical, code-first introduction to deep learning and machine learning.

free_courses.title: Google's Machine Learning Crash Course
free_courses.description: A fast-paced, practical introduction to machine learning with TensorFlow APIs.

free_courses.title: Elements of AI
free_courses.description: An introduction to AI for everyone, covering the basics of AI and machine learning.
